content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Copper plate mine at position (-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Lab at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING

### Stone furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access a lab entity
- Ensure that the lab is placed at the correct position before attempting to access it. The error indicates that no entity of type lab was found at the specified position (6.0, 0.0).

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all electrical entities are properly connected to the electric network to avoid power-related issues. The electricity group was noted as NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.
